programme.title: The Lion Guard
programme.desc: Beshte befriends a gecko who wants to be a crocodile.

programme.title: The Lion Guard
programme.desc: One of the Pride Lands wisest animals needs an escort.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: Needless to Say
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Enjoy the musical wealth of the All Star Band in this episode of Morgenland Festival. Featuring graduate of the Boston Conservatory and vocalist Dima Oshno, both songs "Dream" and "Mugam" are played by the All Star Band and express a range of moods that vary from peaceful quietude to outbursts of energy.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Edina Szirtes Mokus, expresses her talents in a restless exploration across multiple genres, manifested in her prolific output which includes her work with various artists as well as her own band, string quartet, singer/songwriter projects and compositions for musicals and dance theatre.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2023, jazzahead! paid special attention to Germanys jazz scene and invited thirty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the artists presenting themselves at jazzahead! 2023 is Polish violinist Amalia "Umeda" Obrębowska with her quartet. The Amalia Umeda Quartets sound can be described as a fusion between contemporary, experimental jazz, and traditional Slavic music, which is sure to make an impact on the international music scene.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2022, jazzahead! paid special attention to Canadas jazz scene and invited forty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. One of the bands taking the stage at jazzahead! 2022 is the trio of Scottish pianist-composer Fergus McCreadie. Upon his graduation from the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland in 2018, McCreadie immediately made an impact on the European scene, playing jazz reflecting Scotlands landscape and musical traditions as well as American and Scandinavian influences. Ferguss second album "Forest Floor" puts him onto the world stage. Fergus McCreadie appears alongside double bassist David Bowden and drummer Stephen Henderson.

programme.title: A$AP Rocky and A$AP Ferg
programme.sub-title: A$AP Rocky and A$AP Ferg: Live at The Hordern Pavilion
programme.desc: Big hits, booty dancing, stage dives, fan freestyles and of course, controversy, A$AP Rockys debut Down Under tour had it all! At his sold-out Sydney show, hip hops hottest star and 5000 rowdy fans got wild for the night at the Hordern Pavilion and we captured it all exclusively.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: Moondog and The London Saxophonique
programme.desc: Moondog, a gaunt, mysterious and extravagantly-garbed blind street musician was celebrated among New Yorkers for two decades before gaining acclaim in Europe as an avant-garde composer conducting orchestras before royalty. Artists such as Charlie Parker, Leonard Bernstein, Steve Reich and Philip Glass have called him one of the great musical visionaries of our century. Day in and day out, the man whose real name is Louis T. Hardin, was as taciturn and unchanging a landmark of the midtown Manhattan streetscape as the George M. Cohan statue in Duffy Square. No matter the weather, he invariably dressed in a homemade robe, sandals, a flowing cape, and a horned Viking helmet - the tangible expression of what he referred to as his "Nordic philosophy". For this show, he teams up with renowned saxophone ensemble London Saxophonic for an eccentric performance.

programme.title: Richard Bona - Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: "Jazz à Vienne" is one of the worlds most prestigious jazz festivals. Ever since 1981 it has attracted leading jazz artists, with many of them playing return engagements. Unsurprisingly, the festivals 2013 edition did not fall short of expectations: the lineup was filled with the biggest names in music. Among them was the wonderful Richard Bona. He conquered the world with his bass and voice a long time ago. Joined on stage by Mike Rodrigues on trumpet, Luisito and Robert Quinteros on percussions, Ozzy Melendez on trombone, and Osmandy Paredes on piano, Bona once again shows why audiences around the world fall for his music.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the multi-ethnic ensemble Hijaz. This band explores the dialogue between piano and the oud, a pear-shaped stringed instrument from the East. Hijaz is a close-knit quartet that explores the differences and similarities between Mediterranean cultures in order to create moments of harmony, warmth, and great musical beauty.

programme.title: Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Ntjam Rosie
programme.sub-title: Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Ntjam Rosie: Homelands
programme.desc: Homelands is a collaboration between Artvark Saxophone Quartet and Cameroonian-Dutch singer Ntjam Rosie. The music is inspired by both traditional and modern music from Ntjams home country Cameroon, (Manu Dibango and Richard Bona) as well as by an Afro-European blend of soul, jazz, gospel and world music. Using unorthodox sounds as the basis of their compositions, Artvark continues to be radical, experimenting with alternative ways of playing the sax. For this project, they explore the world of electronics and effects to create new sounds. Ntjams role is divers. She is the quartets fifth instrument, recites spoken word, plays (vocal) percussion, forms duos or trios with the saxophones and accompanies the quartet on her guitar. She performs texts in English as well as in French, one of Cameroons official languages, and sings in Bulu, her mother tongue.

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the American saxophone player James Brandon Lewis.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Michelle David - Jazz in Duketown
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationall renowned artists. The talented American singer Michelle David performs pop and gospel music that feeds the heart and soothes the soul. Having grown up with the church, she started singing at the age of four. A year later she joined her first band, The Mission of Love. In 1980 she enrolled at Fiorello H. LaGuardia High School of Music and Art and Performing Arts in New York City, known from the film Fame. During this time, she appeared as an extra in the legendary comedy film Ghostbusters. Musicals and tours with the bands of Diana Ross and Michael Bolton followed.

programme.title: Chet Baker Quintet
programme.desc: Chet Baker Quintet: Live in 64 features a great concert by the foremost interpreter of West Coast jazz in the early and mid-50s. Chet Baker had a generally restrained, intimate playing style and attracted attention beyond jazz for his photogenic looks and great singing. However, his career was marred by drug addiction. This show is a haunting 1964 performance in a Belgian TV studio with a quartet including long-time sidemen and saxophonist Jacques Pelzer and French pianist Rene Urtreger. Songs include the Miles Davis classic "So What", and a very rare rendition of jazz standard "Time After Time" featuring Chets cool vocal style.

programme.title: BIRDtv
programme.desc: Rotterdams BIRD is a club, cafe and restaurant with a live music programme thats deeply rooted in jazz, and also branches out towards soul, funk, hip-hop and electronic music as well. Its name "BIRD" refers to the nickname of the legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker (1920-1955). BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, good wines, no-nonsense beers and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programmes: BIRD.tv, allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from the first row! This episode is a fantastic registration of the after party of the North Sea Jazz Festival: Boogieball. This mega jam session is a great coming together of, amongst others, bassist Bootsy Collins, guitarist Flávio Silva, and drummer/vocalist Sheila E.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this episode is vocalist Mariana Aydar, who masters the música popular brasileira repertoire (MPB) like no other. She was born in a family of musicians, and has been dubbed the "hottest singer of the moment" by Veja, one of Brazils leading newsmagazines. For her performance at Da Pá Virada Sessions, Aydar (vocals and triangle) is joined by Cosme Vieira (accordion) and Feeh Silva (zabumba).

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Naima
programme.desc: Explore the music of one of the most influential and innovative saxophonists in jazz history: John Coltrane! Immerse yourself in this collection of remarkable performances from the early 1960s that showcase Coltranes unparalleled artistry and unique sound during a transformative period in the artists career. Recorded in various European cities, Coltrane is seen playing the songs "Autumn Leaves", "Hackensack", "My Favorite Things", "I Want To Talk About You", "Vigil", and "Naima". Tune in and experience why the music of John Coltrane has touched the lives of so many!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Maybe this time
programme.desc: Relive the magic of one of the most beloved crooners in music history in his prime: Tony Bennett! Recorded live in Londons Royal Albert Hall on March 2, 1974, this enchanting performance showcases Bennetts remarkable vocal prowess and charisma to full effect. Bennett is accompanied by his musical director Torrie Zito and an orchestra of British musicians that includes Kenny Clare (drums), Don Lusher (trombone), and Kenny Baker (trumpet). Tune in for Bennetts captivating take on songs "The Good Things in Life", "My Favorite Things", "My Love", "Ive Got Five Dollars", "It Dont Mean a Thing", and "Maybe This Time" in this magical concert recording.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: No early breakthrough rock and roll artist is more important to the development of the genre than Chuck Berry (1926-2017). Influenced by jazz and rhythm and blues, he was rock and rolls greatest songwriter, the main shaper of its instrumental voice, one of its greatest guitarists, and one of its greatest performers. In this 1965 Face au Public TV episode, Chuck Berry plays a string of hit songs, including his 1956 smash hit "Roll Over Beethoven", "Promised Land" and "Johnny B. Goode". Chuck cuts loose on guitar and the conservative crowd finally gets it.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the amazing Dutch pianist and composer Harmen Fraanje.

programme.title: On the Road With Duke Ellington
programme.sub-title: On the Road With Duke Ellington: I
programme.desc: In May 2014, the Conservatory of Amsterdam hosted a unique conference about one of the greatest jazz composers of the 20th century: Duke Ellington. Musicologists and musicians with a special bond with Ellington and his music spoke about his life and music. Among them were David Schiff, author of The Ellington Century, and Harvey Cohen, author of Duke Ellingtons America. Moreover, concerts were played by jazz pianist Matt Cooper, the Calefax Reed Quintet, and the Concert Big Band of the Conservatory of Amsterdam conducted by David Berger. The winner of the Boy Edgar Prize 2013, viola player Oene van Geel, performed his All Ellington Project.

programme.title: The New Conrad Miller Trio Live at Mochers
programme.desc: Full-time pianist, composer, teacher, and producer Coen Molenaar - aka Conrad Miller - is active all over the world in styles ranging as widely as jazz, fusion, dance, funk, RandB, rock, and neo-soul. In this 2021 performance from Rossini Studios in Stuttgart, Germany, Miller plays contemporary trio jazz with his bandmates David de Marez Oyens (double bass) and Enrique Firpi (drums).

programme.title: Coleman Hawkins live in Belgium, 1962
programme.desc: A jazz festival named after the inventor of the instrument most associated with the genre, Adolphe Sax, would be incomplete without the man who laid the groundwork for how the instrument is played today. This must have been the reasoning of the organizers of the Festival International de Jazz Adolphe Sax in Dinant, Belgium, when they invited tenor saxophone giant Coleman Hawkins to perform there in June 1962. Appearing with a group that includes the French pianist George Arvanitas, one-time Duke Ellington bassist Jimmy Woode, and expat drummer Kansas Fields, the musician also known as "Bean" and "Hawk" serves up an hour-long set of familiar standards bookended by Hank Jones "Chant" and J. J. Johnsons "Wee Dot".

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.sub-title: R. Brecker, B. Wallace and Band
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, American trumpeter Randy Brecker and saxophonist Bennie Wallace brought their band of pianist Elian Elias, drummer Peter Erskine and bassist Marc Johnson to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. Together they put on a stellar duo performance.

programme.title: Dizzy Gillespie, Bebop
programme.desc: Pianist Kenny Barrons June 27, 2019 appearance at the Alfa Jazz Festival in Ukraines Lviv was a celebration of sublime jazz virtuosity. The revered elder statesmen of jazz piano brought his regular working trio of Kiyoshi Kitagawa (bass) and Jonathan Blake (drums), augmented by stellar jazzman Marcus Strickland (tenor saxophone) and young lion Riley Mulherkar (trumpet). Their seamless blend of classic bebop and modern explorations spoke of a deep, emotive connection to each note, captivating the Ukrainian audience with lyrical improvisations during this unforgettable concert.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts. Due to COVID-19, only half of the scheduled performances of the 2021 edition were actually recorded in Bremen. The other performances were captured by the artists themselves on various locations of their own choosing. Among the performing artists is American jazz pianist, composer and Steinway artist Connie Han. She has been compared to legendary jazz pianists McCoy Tyner and Hank Jones, although her musical direction is associated with the Young Lions-revolution of the late 1980s, which was spearheaded by the likes of the Marsalis Brothers, keyboardist Kenny Kirkland, and drummer Jeff "Tain" Watts. She plays a solo recital for jazzahead! 2021.

programme.title: The Mel Lewis Orchestra live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Mel Lewis Orchestra was arguably the most influential big band since the swing era. They were an unusual band, creating new styles, succeeding in an era when big bands were unpopular and remaining integrated during racially tense periods.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: Portrait of Maria Ana Bobone
programme.desc: Maria Ana Bobone (Portugal) is one of the best fado singers of her generation. She started singing fado when she was 16. Her debut album is called "Alma Nova" and marked the beginning of her amazing career. For the recordings of her next two albums, "Luz Destino" and "Senhora da Lapa" Maria Ana welcomed instruments that are usually not present in fado music: the harpsichord and saxophone. After that, she continued her career with the release of Nome de Mar, which received many positive reviews. At the moment, Maria Ana is performing at all Portugals major venues, as well as many festivals and concert halls throughout the world, with the aim to present fado music and Portuguese culture to other cultures. Bobones latest album, Fado and Piano, shows her diversity as an artist, composer and arranger. By including the piano she re-innovates the tradition of the early 20th century. This portrait shows Maria Anas performances and interviews in which she explains her passion for fado music and culture.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jazzed Out Swiss
programme.desc: Jazzed Out proves that a jazz session can take place anywhere. Unusual locations, such as garage buildings, multi-storey car parks, street corners, subway trains, and parks, in several of the worlds metropoles, provide the setting for brief jazz performances. The sheer rawness of the metropoles merge with the musical creations of various artists in search of the perfect urban stage. In this episode, Zurich serves as a backdrop for sets by pianist Stefan Rusconi, Grand Pianoramax, and Nik Bartsch.

programme.title: Blicher Hemmer Gadd - A Music documentary
programme.desc: Award-winning saxophonist Michael Blicher, Hammond wizard Dan Hemmer and legendary drummer Steve Gadd joined forces in 2014 to celebrate their shared love for Hammond-organ soul jazz. The band, which tours extensively throughout the world, has released several albums. Their third album, which was released in November 2019, features U.K. vocalist Paul Carrack on the soulful ballad The First One To Know.

programme.title: PC Qwintett
programme.desc: Pierre Courbois has been one of Europes leading jazz musicians since the mid-sixties. This concert, recorded at the renowned Amsterdam jazz club Bimhuis, sees the drummer playing with his QWINTETT. On the occasion of his 75th birthday in 2015, Courbois hit the road for the Pierre Courbois 75 Years Anniversary Tour. The PC QWINTETT consists of several highly acclaimed Dutch jazz musicians with whom Courbois has worked before in his long and versatile career. Among them are pianist Nike Langenhuijsen, double bassist Egon Kracht, trumpeter Toon de Gouw, and trombonist Ilja Reijngoud. QWINTETT honours the Charles Mingus tradition of thematic and melodic ensemble jazz - but also with an unmistakable Courbois groove! Courbois, known for his own way of combining compositions with improvisations, melodically melts constructions with uneven breaks.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with us in the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. Saxophonist Ben Sluijs and pianist Erik Vermeulen both had a classical training. Both musicians have a strong melodic and harmonic approach. Their music offers no room for showing off: its all about the music itself. Sluijss fascination for jazz grew after he graduated cum laude. This led to him taking lessons with David Liebman in the US. His colleague, Erik Vermeulen, entered the Belgian jazz scene at age 22, playing with his trio. He performed with international stars such as Clark Terry, Joe Lovano, Steve Grossman, Art Farmer, Bob Mover, Toots Thielemans, and Michael Moore. This MotorMusic episode shows the fruits of this inspiring collaboration between these two classically-trained jazz musicians.

programme.title: Live at the Studio de Ermitage
programme.desc: Orchid Big Band is the missing link between American jazz trumpeter and bandleader Thad Jones and Russian modernist composer Igor Stravinsky. The newly-founded combo springs forth from collective Deluge, a collaboration between international artists in various disciplines. Led by Thomas Julienne, Orchid Big Band consists of eighteen musicians that are enthusiastic about playing original music in a modern-day ensemble. This youthful and gender-balanced formation draws in equal measure from jazzs great big bands and European art and world music. Performing at Studio de lErmitage in Paris to celebrate the release of their first album "Éclosion" on March 23, 2023, Orchid Big Band invites listeners to embark on a spirited journey to the very borders of orchestral jazz. The musicians are Christelle Raquillet (flute); Olga Amelchenko, Julien Dubois, Jeanne Michard, Maxime Berton, Julien Dubois (saxophone); Gabriel Levasseur, Olivier Gay, Laure Frejacques, Julie Varlet (trumpet); Rozann Bezier, Sebastien Arruti, Gabrielle Rachel, Sebastien Llado (trombone); Mathilda Haynes (guitar); Clement Simon (piano), Nolwenn Leizour (double bass), Gaetan Diaz (drums), and Thomas Julienne (conductor).

programme.title: Brazilian NYE
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this series is Paulo Novaes. Coming from a family of musicians, Paulo Novaes has already lived through a lifetime of music in spite of his young age. Paulo is the cousin of singer Bruna Caram, with whom he performed in Sao Paulo, Madrid, Barcelona, Lisbon, and other major cities. As a singer, composer, and instrumentalist, his creativity is enjoyed in many forms. With three albums out and his song "Perdoa" reaching over 20 million streams on Spotify, he steps into the spotlights time and time again. Now Da Pá Virada Sessions and Stingray present Paulo Novaes in this intimate performance, recorded in Novaes native city Sao Paulo.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Count Basie and his Orchestra live in Charleroi
programme.desc: Count Basie is one of the most important bandleaders of the swing era. With the exception of a brief period in the early 50s, he led a big band from 1935 until his death almost 50 years later. Basies orchestra was characterized by a light, swinging rhythm section that he led from the piano, lively ensemble work, and generous soloing. Basie was not a composer like Duke Ellington or an important soloist like Benny Goodman. His instrument was his band, which was considered the epitome of swing and deeply influenced jazz. In this 1961 concert recording, Count Basie takes the stage in Charleroi.

programme.title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis Amsterdam
programme.desc: Teus Nobel is a Dutch trumpet and flugelhorn player. As a little boy, he was inspired by "power" trumpeters such as Maynard Ferguson and Bill Chase. While studying at the conservatory, he played both as jazz player and as a commercial session musician at musicals. After his time at the conservatory, he started playing in the Royal Netherlands Air Force Orchestra, playing march music influenced by pop and jazz. Todays broadcast was recorded at the Amsterdam BIMhuis. Teus dedicates his compositions to his all-time heroes Jarmo Hoogendijk, Woody Shaw, Christian Scott, Roy Hargrove and Eric Vloeimans. This performance is based on his second album Legacy.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: We Are Birds - La Ciotat
programme.desc: Nordic afro jazz project "We Are Birds" saw the light between Finland and Africa, during a 2010 jam session in which Finnish jazz pianist Tuomas A. Turunen met African drummer-percussionist and urban griot Dimitri Reverchon. The two composers set their mind to exploring this hybrid genre, and found their perfect complement in bassist Emmanuel Soulignac, who brought his pop influences to the table. Today, We Are Birds explores an accessible mix of jazz and world pop that is based on sharing, listening, understanding, paying attention to each other, and believing in unity.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Sao Paulo Samba
programme.desc: An exceptional concert from Brazil: the Orquestra Sinfônica do Estado de Sao Paulo proves its position as the most important orchestra in Latin America. Conducted by charismatic Maestro John Neschling since 1997, the orchestra is defined by its emblematic interpretations of Latin American music. With "Sao Paulo Samba", the orchestra yet again grips the listener with an electrifying selection of Brazilian and Latin American classics, including works by Heitor Villa-Lobos, Joao Bosco and Astor Piazzolla. The Banda Mantiqueira and singer Mônica Salmaso complement the show.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.sub-title: Paradox Live: Bertus Borgers and The Young Retros
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the Tilburg based Bertus Borgers and his Young Retros!

programme.title: Selah Sue @ Festival Culturebox
programme.desc: Belgian singer-songwriter Selah Sue performed at La Cigale in Paris as part of the digital Culturebox Festival 2020. The singer released her million-selling debut album "Selah Sue" in March 2011, featuring her popular single "Raggamuffin" and her duet "Please" with American hip-hop artist Cee Lo Green. Months after its release, Selah was presented with a European Border Breakers Award (EBBA), for her cross-border success. At La Cigale in 2020, Selah Sue is accompanied by Joachim Saerens on keyboard and Simon Lenski on cello, opening her concert with a jazzed-up So This Is Love, a romantic ballad from Walt Disneys film Cinderella.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Baden Powell Quartet - Jazz Samba
programme.desc: Recorded in 1971 in Paris, France, Brazilian, classically trained bossa nova guitarist Baden Powell and his quartet play Pai, Lotus (written by Baden Powell), Tristeza (by Haroldo Lobo/Niltinho), Round Midnight (by Thelonious Monk), Nega do cabelo duro (by David Nasser/Rubens Soares), and Aos pes da cruz (by Ze da Zilda/Marino Pinto). Powell is joined by Ernesto Ribeiro-Gonçalves on double bass, Helio Schiavo on drums, and Alfredo Bessa on percussion.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne 2017
programme.desc: Watch the performance of Jamie Cullum live at Jazz à Vienne, in 2017.

programme.title: Oum - Music Meeting Festival 2018
programme.desc: Oum El Ghait Benessahraoui, who is better known as Oum, gives a unique glance at ethnic Morrocan musical esthetics. The singer-songwriter is considered to be the ambassador of Morrocan culture, too. Deeply influenced by gospel, jazz, soul and RandB genres, today Oum mixes more and more African music genres, such as Sufi, Hassani, or Afrobeat. Yet, the singers voice still echoes the colours of Aretha Franklin, Ella Fitzgerald or Whitney Houston. It is the African American vocal tradition that made a huge impact on Oum since her early days as the singer. Performing from Music Meeting Festival in Nijmegen, The Netherlands, Oum charms the stage with an exotic sonic journey to the undiscovered lands of North Africa.

programme.title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt: Rosenberg meets Beets
programme.desc: World-class Dutch jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson, and John Clayton. His mother a music teacher and his father an Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey enthusiast, Beets was surrounded by music from an early age. And though music was in their blood, neither parent associated the word "musician" with a career. In this broadcast, Peter Beets teams up with gipsy jazz heros Stochelo Rosenberg, Martin Limberger and Frans van Geest. The strength and precision of Van Geests rhythms and tempo, and the ease with which Stochelos lead guitar soars above them, make this band a cohesive collective - unique in their renditions of standards, Djangos classic compositions, and original tunes composed by Stochelo himself.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.sub-title: Paradox Live: Vein ft. Greg Osby
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the Swiss jazz band VEIN accompanied by saxophone player Greg Osby.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. Back in 1982, legendary jazz clarinettist Benny Goodman performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague with his septet. The "King of Swing" revisited the atmosphere of the 1930s, when jazz enjoyed tremendous popularity.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Josh Evans - Ballad Of Ernie Washington
programme.desc: On July 20, 2018, double bassist Christian McBride presented his band "New Jawn" at the Malta Jazz Festival. A five-time Grammy winner, McBride is one of the most requested, most recorded, and most respected figures in the music world today. Hailing from Philadelphia, this music luminary combines jazz, RandB, pop/rock, hip hop/neo-soul, and classical. Gracing the Malta Jazz stage with him are Nasheet Waits (drums), Marcus Strickland (tenor sax), and Josh Evans (trumpet).

programme.title: Songs She Never Heard
programme.desc: In 2019, the vibrant city of Sofia, Bulgaria, hosted the International A to JazZ Festival. Among the featured acts was the trailblazing jazz trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah. This genre-defying artist captivated the audience with his eclectic "stretch music"; an approach that incorporates hip-hop and reaches back through the American canon into African percussion and its rich melodic content. Trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuahs quintet, which includes drummer Corey Fonville, percussionist Weedie Braimah, pianist Lawrence Fields, and bass guitarist Max Mucha, delivered a performance that defied boundaries and expectations.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.sub-title: TorTube: Dual City Concert Band ft. Hermine Deurlo
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. Foot Together is a TorTube episode featuring Dutch jazz icon Hermine Deurloo on the chromatic harmonica, in collaboration with the Dual City Concert Band led by Rini Swinkels. The spirited big band plays swinging and powerful jazz, with the incredible Hermine Deurloo adding a touch of Toots Thielemans as she plays her Hohner Toots Mellow Tone mouth organ.

programme.title: Oscar Peterson - C Jam Blues
programme.desc: Embark on a remarkable journey through the world of jazz piano as we showcase some of the most iconic and influential pianists in history. This collection of extraordinary performances captures the unique essence and brilliance of legendary pianists Art Tatum, Thelonious Monk, Bud Powell, and others. Revel in Oscar Petersons virtuosity as his trio plays "C-Jam Blues" in Holbaek, Denmark, on May 2, 1964. Let the sublime artistry of Art Tatum captivate you as he interprets Antonín Dvořáks "Humoresque" in 1953. Discover Thelonious Monks enigmatic genius as his quartet performs his iconic composition "Round About Midnight" in Poland on April 4, 1966. Experience the timeless appeal of the Dave Brubeck Quartets odd-metered "Take Five", recorded live in Brussels, Belgium, on October 10, 1964. Delight in the lyrical beauty of Bud Powells solo performance of "Sweet and Lovely" at the Antibes Jazz Festival of July 13, 1960. Witness the fusion of jazz and funk in Herbie Hancock and The Headhunters exhilarating studio performance of "Sly" in Bremen, Germany, recorded on November 6, 1974. Lastly, enjoy the soulful grooves of Horace Silvers "Song for my Father" performed by his quintet at the Umbria Jazz Festival of July 20, 1976. Tune in and let these legendary jazz pianists transport you on unforgettable musical adventures!

programme.title: Hannah Williams and The Affirmations - Moods
programme.desc: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurichs largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europes prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. At Moods, British singer Hannah Williams captures the sound of 1960s soul music, mixing it with funk and rock influences. This groovy blend caught music industry giant Jay-Zs attention: he sampled one of Williams songs on his album 4:44.

programme.title: Ode to Miles
programme.sub-title: Ode to Miles: Bitches Brew Beyond
programme.desc: For the 40th anniversary of the legendary album Bitches Brew from the legend Miles Davis, the trumpeter Wallace Roney is the leader of a band that revives the music of the master. This project is the brainchild of the family of Miles (including his son Erin) and represented by his nephew Vince Wilburn, drummer. This concert at the ancient theater in Vienne, France, is a grand tribute to Miles.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. The Morgenland Chamber Orchestra has been an integral part of the Morgenland Festival since 2009. This ensemble of musicians from Germany and various guest countries performs as part of the festivals opening concert. This episode includes performances sometimes energetic, sometimes soft and soothing.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Art Blakey Live in 1965
programme.desc: Art Blakey: Live in 65 features what many consider to be one of the finest lineups in the history of jazz: Art Blakey (Drums), Bobby Timmons (Piano), Jymie Merritt (Bass), Benny Golson (Sax), and the legendary trumpet player, Lee Morgan. Lost for nearly 50 years, this historic 55-minute concert, filmed in Belgium in 1958 is the only known visual document of this influential band who were together for only six months.

programme.title: Jacques Loussier in Leipzig
programme.sub-title: Jacques Loussier in Leipzig: Play Bach and More
programme.desc: In 1959, Jacques Loussier hit upon the idea that was to make his international reputation, by combining his interest in jazz with his love of J.S. Bach. Only a pianist with such an exceptional classical technique and deft improvisatory skill could have nurtured such a vision. He founded the Play Bach Trio, which used Bachs compositions as the basis for jazz improvisation. The trio immediately caught the public imagination. In their live appearances, tours and concerts, plus a succession of recordings built on the cornerstone of four albums made between 1960 and 1963, Loussiers group achieved the breakthrough to popular commercial success enjoyed by only a select few jazz musicians. In fifteen years, the trio sold over six million albums! On July 28th 2004, the day of Bachs 254th anniversary of death, the Jacques Loussier Trio perform a special concert at the famous St. Thomas Church of Leipzig - the city where Bach composed many of his most famous works.

programme.title: Al McKays Earth, Wind and Fire Experience
programme.desc: Every year since 1970, the German city of Burghausen has been hosting one of the largest jazz festivals in the world. During Burghausen International Jazz Week, Burghausen becomes a Bavarian jazz mecca: guests from all over the world join the Burghausers to enjoy the most wonderful jazz performances as the colorful hustle and bustle of spectators and musicians shake up the city. One of the bands performing here in 2019 is The Earth, Wind and Fire Experience. In this concert, original Earth, Wind and Fire guitarist, writer and musical director Al McKay performs the bands timeless disco and soul. Together with seven of the thirteen original Earth, Wind and Fire members, he keep hits such as Boogie Wonderland and September alive, touring all over the world.

programme.desc: Kui Rexi DNAd leitakse Donovani endise politseiinformaatori mõrvapaigast, saab Rex kahtlusaluseks.

programme.title: Rangad kuriteod
programme.desc: Suurkuritegude ruhm uurib kodutute varjupaigas vabatahtlikuna tootanud teismelise tudruku kadumist ning Buzz avab uuesti aastakumnete taguse, oma isa ja onu mõrva juhtumi. Andy Flynn kaalub oma maja muuki panekut.

programme.title: Ma naen su haalt
programme.desc: Kuum telesõu pakub põnevust, ara arvamise hasarti, ullatusi ja ohtralt huumorit ning meelelahutust. Saates osaleval arvajapaaril tuleb seitsme tundmatu seast eristada imelise lauluoskusega inimesed andekatest teesklejatest, kes uldse laulda ei oska. Arvajatele on abiks nõunikekogu, kuhu seekord kuuluvad Grete Kuld, Andrei Zevakin ning Mart Juur. Kulalisnõunik on armastatud lauljatar Eda-Ines Etti ning erikulalisena liitub nõunikekoguga bravuuritar Anu Saagim. Saadet juhib sarav Piret Laos.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Siin saates leiavad julged vallalised endale kaaslase pelgalt alasti ahvatluse põhjal. Esimesena valib saates kaaslast 30-aastane Leah, kellele meeldivad nii mehed kui naised ning kellel aitab kaaslast valida eksimatu ninaga koer Kush. Jargmine õnnelik valija on 24-aastane võistluskunstide õpetaja Ryan, kes kannatab elumuutva haiguse kaes.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Tanases saates otsib endale kaaslast 27-aastane Richard, kes laulab bandis ja on naiste lemmik, kuid tema tahab hoopis meest. 50-aastane lahutatud David otsib seikluslikku naist, kellega oma elu jagada.

programme.title: Seksperiment
programme.desc: Sotsiaalne eksperiment, mis uurib, kas suhted saavad areneda ilma monogaamiata. Ruhm siiani monogaamseid paare katsetab, kas idee seksida teiste inimestega on vastuolus pusisuhte sailitamisega.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: "Armastuse saar" jatkub ja meie kamp ilusaid vallalisi ihkab jõuda finaali rohkem kui kunagi varem. Varuks on veel palju armastusemange ja kuna laual on 50 000-naelane auhind, pole keegi valmis lahkuma. Aga kui kaalul on nii palju, siis kes neist on ohutult paarilisega koos ja keda ahvardab saarelt valjaviskamine?

programme.title: Armastus esimesest tantsusammust
programme.desc: Romantiline film! Hope saab ulesandeks õpetada Manhattani ihaldatuimat poissmeest oma saravaks pulmaks tantsima. Mis juhtub aga siis, kui hoopis tantsutunnis suttib leek?

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Tiim otsib kokku põnevaid fakte mõnede roogade kohta, mida britid valjast tellida armastavad. Jimmy Doherty on Tais avastamas uht kevadrullide ootamatut komponenti ja siis suundub Indiasse, kus saab teada, mis valjast tellitud karri nii maitsvaks teeb. Amanda Byram ja selgitab valja, miks tekitab mõni tass kohvi rohkem suminat kui teine ning Andi Oliver uurib, kuidas valmivad doner kebabid.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" sõidab labi kõik Ühendkuningriigi nurgad, et saada selgust, mis teeb kodumaised toidud nii eriliseks. Andi Oliver uurib puuviljajook Pimmsi telgitaguseid, Jimmy Doherty aga Carribbean Jerki maitsesegu maitsmisnaarmetele. Jimmy selgitab valja, millised Briti õunad kupsetamiseks sobivad. Kate Quilton kohtub Briti pudrutšempioniga ja Matt Tebbutt saab teada, milline aadikas kala juurde sobib.

programme.title: Kodustiil
programme.desc: Saates pakume inspiratsiooni, ideid ja praktilisi lahendusi, kuidas muuta oma kodu stiilsemaks, hubasemaks, nutikamaks, turvalisemaks, energiatõhusamaks ning uldse paigaks, kus on hea olla igal ajal ja iga ilmaga! Vaart ideid ja napunaiteid jagub nii suvilasse, korterisse kui ka suurde majja ning aeda. Loome koos kodud hubaseks ja stiilseks!

programme.title: Hooaeg
programme.desc: Saade annab vastused mitmetele kusimustele: Millised on uued kaubamargid Eesti turul naha- ja kehahoolduses, dekoratiivkosmeetikas ning juuksemaailmas? Milliseid tooteid kasutada kodus ning miks tasub minna ennast turgutama ilusalongi? Millised on uued rõiva- ja jalatsikollektsioonid kiirelt arenevas moemaailmas? Millist rõivastust endale valida? Millised on ehtemaailma uudised? Elustiili osas avardavad silmaringi lastega seotud teemad, lemmikloomad, autod, toitlustuskohad, erinevad puhkuse veetmise võimalused nagu spaad ja treeningklubid, muuseumid ja uued raamatud.

programme.title: Mitme naoga Eesti
programme.desc: Tana tõmbame pidurõivad selga ja tantsukingad jalga, sest ees ootab meeleolukas Poola põhiseaduse paeva tahistamine! Meie võõrustaja Sławomira katab laua parimate paladega, sealhulgas kuulsa mazurka koogiga, mida saavad omal kael kaunistada saatejuht Robert ja rootslane Gustaf. Mis aga teeb uhest peost tõelise poola peo, seda naed juba saates "Mitme naoga Eesti"!

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Sõjavaekadett Eve tahab poissi, kes armastab muusikat. Caelum on oma esimesel kohtingul transmehena.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Aeren võidab tavaliselt kõiges, valja arvatud armastuses. Kas Chloe suudab seda muuta?

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Clayton asub uhelt daamidest aru parima seltskonnas leviva kuulujutu kohta. Kaitlyn Bristowe teeb ullatusvisiidi ning suunab nii Claytoni kui daamid vapralt jagama oma kõige varjatumaid ebakindlusi. Naitleja Nicole Eggert jagab daamidele nippe.

programme.title: Tulbid sudames
programme.desc: Romantiline mangufilm. Sisekujundajana tootav suurlinna tudruk Rose kohtub oma lapsepõlvekodu tulbifarmis lillearis tegutseva Tomiga. Paraku on vanemate istandused majanduslikult kehvas seisus ja neil on plaan kogu kupatus maha muua konkurendile. Tomil on varuks plaan, kuidas farm paasta ja ka Rose peab nuud tegema elu tahtsaimad otsused. Kas armastus kaunite õite ja vanemate elutoo vastu kaaluvad ules selle, mis Roseil juba olemas?

programme.title: Midagi laenatut
programme.desc: Menukas romantiline draamakomoodia, mille lavastajaks "Naabermaja pornostaari" režissoor Luke Greenfield ning kus peaosa kehastab Oscari-nominent Kate Hudson ("Kuulsuse jahil"). Rachel on vallaline jurist, tema parim sõbranna Darcy on aga kihlatud. Parast oma sunnipaeval joodud paari uleliigset napsuklaasi arkab muidu vaga tagasihoidlik Rachel aga Darcy kihlatu Dexi kaisus, kellest ta kunagi oli sisse võetud. Jagnevad suumepiinad ja paljastused ning proovile pannakse nii armastus kui sõprus.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Supertoitude erisaates on midagi kogu perele. Matt Tebbutt katsetab jarele vaiteid keefiri tervislikkuse kohta, Amanda Byram uurib, kas uks igas kapis leiduv toit aitab teismelistel paremini õppida, Jimmy Doherty selgitab valja granaatõuna tõhususe Alzheimeri tõve ennetusel, Briony May Williams saab teada, kuidas kala allergikuid aitab ning Kate Quilton uurib kofeiini kasutust enneaegsete laste ravis.

programme.title: Viie tarni kokk
programme.desc: Poolfinaal paneb proovile nelja võistleja piirid, kui neil tuleb valmistada peolauale peeni kaunistusi ja pakkuda reaalajas toitlustust 100 kulalisega banketil.

programme.title: Agatha Christie krimilood. Kerge on tappa
programme.desc: Agatha Christie menuka romaani ekraniseering kutsub vaatajaid põnevat mõrvamusteeriumi lahendama. Endine politseinik Luke Fitzwilliam satub rongis juhuslikult vestlema Miss Pinkertoniga, kes kahtlustab, et tema kodulinnas tegutseb sarimõrvar. Kui naine peagi sureb, otsustab Fitzwilliam tõe valja selgitada. Ta peab tabama mõrvari enne, kui toimub uus mõrv.

programme.title: Langenud naised
programme.desc: Lydia veab Charlottei uha sugavamale oma võrku, aga kas Charlotte peaks riskima kõigega, lootuses tabada Lydia teolt? Lucy mangib Falloniga ohtlikku mangu, millel võivad olla katastroofilised tagajarjed.

programme.title: Langenud naised
programme.desc: Charlotte on Golden Squareil lõksus ja tulevik tundub troostitu, kui ta just ei suuda Lydiat oma ustavuses veenda. Lucy teeb kohutava vea ja Margaret peab riskima kõigega, et oma mõlemad tutred paasta.

programme.title: Seksperiment
programme.desc: Sotsiaalne eksperiment, mis uurib, kas suhted saavad areneda ilma monogaamiata. Ruhm siiani monogaamseid paare katsetab, kas idee seksida teiste inimestega on vastuolus pusisuhte sailitamisega.

Kui naine peagi sureb, otsustab Fitzwilliam tõe valja selgitada. Ta peab tabama mõrvari enne, kui toimub uus mõrv.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Lotoga miljoni võitnud paar annab Davidile võimaluse naasta oma kodulinna, et otsida seal taiuslikku kodu.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Kertul on õdedele haid uudiseid. Albert kurdab Sirjele oma muret Inna parast. Mari matab end toosse, kuid probleemid kodus ei lase end kaua oodata. Kertu kohtub taas Andresega, Mari puistab Gunnarile sudant ja Piret aitab Innat.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Carmelo hoiatab Castañedasid. Isaac naaseb kulla. Severo langetab otsuse.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Aeren võidab tavaliselt kõiges, valja arvatud armastuses. Kas Chloe suudab seda muuta?

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Leah ja Justin tabatakse teolt. Eden laheb Abigaili suhtes ule piiri. Mali ettepanek tuleb Kirbyle ootamatult.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Õhk on tulvil armastust, kui Zach ja kolm finalisti reisivad Taisse Krabisse.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Suhkruste toitude eri. Matt uurib Pariisi kondiitriarides, miks on makroonid nii kallid ja kust hiljutine soolakaramelli hullus alguse sai. Jimmy avab USAs jaatisevalmistamise saladusi ja siis suundub Šveitsi, et saada teada, miks vahel šokolaad pealt valgeks tõmbub ning lisaks teeb avastusi kihisevate maiustuste kohta. Kate aga suveneb kusimusse, miks vahel on mesi vedel, aga vahel mitte.

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Melanie ootab oma teist last ja on aarmiselt narviline, viimaks soandab ta Lenale tunnistada, et peresõber vagistas ta ja laps on vagistaja oma. Lena soovitab tal kõik mehele ara raakida. See aga ei anna oodatud tulemust. Julia valmistub poe avamiseks. Quirin on Munchenis ja lausa upub toosse, mis Lenat sugugi ei rõõmusta. Leo dementsus muutub aina hullemaks, kuid Eva ei taha mõeldagi, et tallu tuleks võõras inimene teda hooldama. Peale kahe kalli nutitelefoni leidmist otsustab Eva siiski midagi ette võtta.

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Melanie ootab oma teist last ja on aarmiselt narviline, viimaks soandab ta Lenale tunnistada, et peresõber vagistas ta ja laps on vagistaja oma. Lena soovitab tal kõik mehele ara raakida. See aga ei anna oodatud tulemust. Julia valmistub poe avamiseks. Quirin on Munchenis ja lausa upub toosse, mis Lenat sugugi ei rõõmusta. Leo dementsus muutub aina hullemaks, kuid Eva ei taha mõeldagi, et tallu tuleks võõras inimene teda hooldama. Peale kahe kalli nutitelefoni leidmist otsustab Eva siiski midagi ette võtta.

programme.title: Armastusega Inglismaale
programme.desc: Alil paistab elus kõik olemas olevat, kuid siis tuleb tal sõita seoses salaparase ulesandega Inglismaale aardejahile labi ajaloo, mille kaigus ta leiab, et on avatud nii uutele kui ka vanadele armuleekidele.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: Kati on 22-aastane vanematest eraldi elav kaugõppetudeng, kes otsib kooli kõrvalt tood. Toootsingutel satub firmasse, kus õige pea hakkab selguma, et neiult eeldavat tavaparaste tookohustuste taitmise asemel ootab ulemus (Olaf Suuder) hoopis intiimteenust.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Gracie otsib erilist poissi, kellel on olemas ka "metsik pool". Ta esimesele kohtingukaaslasele Danielile meeldib maadelda.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Tim annab Edenile nõu. Abigail loobub. Justin ja Leah ignoreerivad elevanti keset tuba.

programme.title: Frankie kohtub Jackiga
programme.desc: Sademed lendavad, kui Frankie kohtub veterinaari Jackiga, kes paastab tema koera elu. Tundub, et neil on maaratud koos olla, kuid on uks probleem: Jack on juba kihlatud.

programme.title: Lootusega lõunasse
programme.desc: Perekond Roberts seab kahtluse alla oma tuleviku Austraalias ja Kate seab ohtu oma too.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Zach tutvustab Gabit ja Kaityt oma perele ning Jesse Palmer koos Zachi ja kolme finalistiga teeb stuudiopubliku ees ulevaate rannaku emotsionaalsest lõpp-punktist.

programme.title: Seksperiment
programme.desc: Sotsiaalne eksperiment, mis uurib, kas suhted saavad areneda ilma monogaamiata. Ruhm siiani monogaamseid paare katsetab, kas idee seksida teiste inimestega on vastuolus pusisuhte sailitamisega.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Proua DiLaurentis hairib jatkuvalt oma kohaloluga kõiki. Toby raagib Spencerile oma saladuse. "A" tapab peaaegu Mona.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Üllatusi tuleb ette aina rohkem ning pinge meie saareelanike seas aina tõuseb. Võistlus 50 000-naelase auhinna nimel on tuline ja noored vallalised seisavad dilemma ees. Nad võivad olla kull sõbrad ja armastajad, aga samal ajal ka vihased konkurendid.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Lotoga miljoni võitnud õde ja vend saavad võimaluste taasluua lapsepõlvenostalgia ja soetada endale metsa suvila.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Mari jagab Kardiga oma kahtlusi, Piret on Innale toeks ja Kertu pabistab esitluse parast. Laevas toimuv raamatuesitlus loob kõik kaardid segamini, sest juba enne uritust laheb kõik vastupidi, kui oodatud. Kertu annab endast parima, kuid...

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Emilia rahustab Fed. Consuelo julgustab noori põgenema. Matías kulastab Isaaci.

programme.title: Laastav maavarin
programme.desc: Võimas katastroofifilm! Los Angelest tabab õige pea kumnepallise magnituudiga maavarin ja aega napib, et linn ning selle elanikud paasta.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Ameerikas
programme.desc: Parast Las Vegase tormilist ood otsustatakse aeg maha võtta ja sõita loodusesse. Teedu ja Kristjani sihtkohaks on maaliline Colorado jõgi, millele Kristjan laheneb maitsi ja Teet õhutsi. Samal ajal kui Kristjan võitleb kõrgusekartusega Hooveri tammil, sõidab Teet kopteriga Colorado jõe kuulsa oru, Suure Kanjoni suunas. Ja loomulikult tuleb igal Ameerikasse jõudnul omal nahal ara proovida, mis tunne on olla kauboi. Kaks kanget valjastavad hobused ja suunduvad ratsamatkale.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Kolm Oscarit võitnud Christopher Nolani eepiline marulipõnevik Teisest maailmasõjast. Liitlasvagede sõdurite uskumatu evakuatsiooni Belgiast, Suurbritanniast ja Prantsusmaalt, kui Natsi-Saksamaa sõjavagi neil tee ara lõikas ning neid Prantsusmaal Dunkirki rannal 1940. aastal Prantsusmaa lahingus 27. maist 4. juunini piiras. Rannaliival ootas oma saatust ule 400 000 sõduri…

programme.title: Laastav maavarin
programme.desc: Võimas katastroofifilm! Los Angelest tabab õige pea kumnepallise magnituudiga maavarin ja aega napib, et linn ning selle elanikud paasta.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Jessica Chobot ja Phil Torres jatkavad oma seiklust California Catalina saarel ja uurivad tundmatuid allveeobjekte, mida on nahtud alates 1920. aastatest.

programme.title: Robsoni ja Jimi Islandi kalapuugiseiklus
programme.desc: Robson Green ja Jim Murray on Islandil elu kõige vaimustavamal kalastusreisil. Neid huvitab eriti lõhega seonduv, aga tegelikkuses jõuavad nad kogu saarele tiiru peale teha ja uhtlasi ka uksjagu hingemuresid ara lahendada.

programme.title: Rooli võim
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim liiklussaade, mille teemade ring ulatub automarkidest kindlustuseni. Saade paneb proovile ka tuntud inimeste sõiduoskused ning nad paljastavad, mis neid siinses liikluses hairib ning mida tuleks liikluses umber korraldada. Muu hulgas osalevad saate tegijad ka liiklusreididel. Rooli Võim ei ole mõeldud uksnes tanastele autoomanikele ja juhtidele, vaid kõigile, kel tuleb rohkemal või vahemal maaral liiklusega kokku puutuda, ehk siis ka jalakaijatele ja uhistranspordiga liiklejatele.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Politseisaade.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Ameerikas
programme.desc: Las Vegas jaab selja taha ja ees ootab San Francisco. Öo otsustatakse veeta Ameerika kõige tuupilisemas maanteeaarses motellis. Otsingud osutuvad ule ootuste vaevaliseks ja keskoo paiku tundub, et seekord jaavad kõigi oomajade uksed suletuks. Jargmisel hommikul uletavad Teet ja Kristjan Ameerika uhe tuntuima sumboli, Kuldvarava silla, et jõuda lõpuks San Franciscosse - linna, kus hõljub endiselt lillelaste vabameelne vaimsus.

programme.title: Clarksoni farm
programme.desc: Nõukogu võimuga silmitsi seistes kasutab Jeremy Clarkson oma kahte parimat oskust - need on diplomaatia ja austus burokraatia vastu.

programme.title: Minu pere mõrvamusteerium
programme.desc: Vandeadvokaadid uurivad kurikuulsat Dorseti koduperenaise juhtumit, keda suudistati oma abikaasa mõrvas. Nad soovivad eraldada fakte valjamõeldistest, kuna see lugu inspireeris Thomas Hardy romaani "DUrbervilleide Tess".

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: San Diego spordilaat muutub ohtlikuks, kui praktikant kaob pidutsemise kaigus Gaslamp Districtis. Tõendid viivad uurijad šokeeriva avastuseni.

programme.title: Hommikuks surnud
programme.desc: Florida Coral Gablesi jõukam kogukond on vapustatud, kui oosel tapetakse nende kaks nende eliidi hulgast. Politsei asub otsima ohtlikku mõrvarit, kes on vabaduses.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Eliitne erakool satub tule alla seoses aastakumnete taguste õpilaste kaebustega neid seksuaalselt vaarkohelnud õpetajate kohta. Kui suureks ohvrite ja rundajate arv kasvada võib? Ja kui sugavale ulatuvad nende sundmuste varjamise juured?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: "Valge raev" pani 2015. aastal Charlestoni nooruki mõrvama uheksa mustanahalist kirikukulastajat ja kaivitab plaani Kansases moslemitest pagulaste tapmiseks. Ametivõimud tahavad teada, kui kaugele see kõik minna võib.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Peruus Limas kaob poliitiku tutar parast peoõhtut valjas. Meest, kelle seltsis teda viimati nahti, seostatakse uhe noore ameeriklanna kadumisega 4500 km kaugusel. Milliste võigaste skeemidega ta tegeleb?

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Sajandas, juubeliosas kaotab Ali kihlveos oma armastatud televiisori. Vanade tuttavatena on selles seerias nii "Sõprade" Joey kui hiljem Bridget Jonesina tuntuks saanud Renee Zellweger.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bundyd võitlevad au eest saada supermarketis kliendiks number uks miljon. Bud ja Kelly kiusavad poe maskotti.

programme.title: Jaahoki MM
programme.desc: Jaahoki 2025. aasta maailmameister selgub 9. kuni 25. maini Taanis ja Rootsis toimuval turniiril. Teekonda ihaldatud tiitli poole alustavad 16 meeskonda, kes on jaotatud kahte alagruppi. A alagruppi kuuluvad Austria, Kanada, Soome, Prantsusmaa, Lati, Slovakkia, Sloveenia ja Rootsi, mangitakse Stockholmis. B alagruppi kuuluvad Tšehhi, Taani, Saksamaa, Ungari, Kasahstan, Norra, Šveits ja USA. Need mangud toimuvad Herningis. Alagrupiturniir mangitakse 9. kuni 20. maini. Mõlemast alagrupist 4 paremat paasevad rehamangudele kaheksa parema hulka. Veerandfinaalid mangitakse 22. mail. Poolfinaalid mangitakse 24. mail. 3.-4. koha mang ja finaal mangitakse 25. mail.

programme.title: Mr. Bean
programme.desc: Ootamatult pannakse mr Bean last hoidma, aga sellest hoolimata otsustab ta paeva taiel rinnal nautida. Iseasi, kas ka laps nendest vintsutustest terve nahaga paaseb.

programme.title: Clarksoni farm
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson satub vastamisi oma vihavaenlasega - magraga. Jeremy kardab oma tervise parast.

programme.title: Ka gangster on inimene
programme.desc: Komoodia gangsteribossist Paul Vittist, keda tabavad uhtakki kohutavad hadad: teda vaevavad paanikahood, ta ei suuda enam oma armukesega murada ja tagatipuks puhkeb taisjõus mees alatihti ilma põhjuseta nutma. Viimaks poordub ta psuhhiaater Beni poole ja hirmunud hingetohter nõustubki gangsteri terveks ravima. Aega selleks on aga vaga vahe, sest tulekul on otsustava tahtsusega maffia tippkohtumine.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Bikrami jooga on uks maailma levinuimatest joogastiilidest, kuid mitme naise vaitel on selle looja Bikram Choudhury neid seksuaalselt ahistanud ja isegi runnanud. Kuidas sai tervendajast seksuaalkiskja?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused

programme.title: Eesti kõige-kõige
programme.desc: Viis meest erinevatelt aladelt uritavad panna palli korvi nii kõrgele kui suudavad. Meie viimane pealtpanija on taas korvpallur ja senistest osalejatest pikim. Keegi on mõõtnud, et Martin Jurtom on tapselt 2 meetrit ja see meid ei sega. Kull aga ajab segadusse, kumb jalg on mehel tugevam. Sooritusi tegi ta kordamooda vasaku ja paremaga. Kas sellest piisas, et võistlus kinni panna? Saatejuht Kalev Kruus.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid

programme.title: Jalg

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Debra osutab sarnasustele Ray ja tema tuutu nõo Gerardi vahel.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Ray ei saa aru, miks Debra viimasel ajal nii kirglik on olnud. Selgub, et sedasi on alati parast trenniskaimist. Niisiis laheb Ray ise spordiklubisse, et Debra sumpaatiat naha, ja rikub trennikogemuse ara.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Debra katsetab uut lahenemist, et Marie negatiivse hoiakuga toime tulla.

programme.desc: Ray ja Debra otsustavad kaksikud veel uheks aastaks eelkooli jatta.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Ray tahab Mariele jõulukingiks perepildi teha lasta - kuid ilma Debra pereta.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Alani katse korraldada lõbus isa ja poja nadalavahetus laheb mokka. Charlie joodab venna lohutuseks tais ja teel koju pakub taksojuht neile head nõu, mida võtta ette kõikjale nina toppiva emaga.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Alan otsib tulutult ravi oma kiilaspaisuse vastu, Charlie on aga mures, et ei suuda Chelseale rahuldust pakkuda.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Chelsea tahab, et Charlie enne pulmi peotantsu õpiks. Charlie aga avastab, et Chelsea on oma rahalise olukorra kohta valetanud.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Jakei pruut on jõuludeks ara sõitnud ja Charlie on varmalt nõus talle truudusetuse kunsti tutvustama.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Jake otsustab oma endisele pruudile laulu kirjutada, et ta tagasi võita. Herb ja Alan puuavad oma sõprust Judithi ees salajas hoida.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Pami vanematel on abieluprobleemid ja nad lahevad lahku, kui Pami isa kuuleb, kui vaga Jim Pami armastab. Michael laseb tervel kontoril enda ule nalja visata, kuid solvub naljade peale.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael laheb teistesse buroodesse Scrantoni edust kõnelema, Pam autojuhiks kaasas. Uticas laheb kõne lorri, kuid Pam lepib ara abiellunud ja rasedaks jaanud Kareniga. Seepeale sõidab Michael Nashuasse, et Hollyga ara leppida.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael sokutab klientide paberipakkidesse "kuldseid pileteid", mille eest saab allahindlust. See tekitab ulemustes pahameelt ja Michael puuab idee Dwighti kaela sokutada.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michaelil on kokkupõrge uue asjaliku asepresidendi Charles Mineriga (Idris Elba), kes tuhistab Michaeli 15. juubelipeo ja saadab peoplaneerimiskomitee laiali. Ka Jimil laheb Charlesiga kõik valesti.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michaelil on jaanud kaks nadalat tootada ja ta lollitab tavalisest veelgi rohkem. Michael otsustab avada uue paberifirma, kuid ukski tootaja ei taha tema juurde toole tulla.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Alex paljastab kogemata isale saladuse Haley kohta. Cameron teeskleb seljavigastust, et tabada Clairei valetamas, Mitchell tunnistab ules saladuse Jay uhe uhkeima hetke kohta ning Luke aitab Mannyl tudrukule muljet avaldada.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Cameroni sunnipaev on 29. veebruaril ja ta saab ule nelja aasta jalle sunnipaeva õigel paeval tahistada. Mitchell tunneb suurt survet korraldada talle meeldejaav pidu. Jay mehelikkus satub kahtluse alla. Phil kavatseb poistega 29. veebruari tahistada, aga tudrukud rikuvad ta plaani.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Mitchelli hoiatustest hoolimata taastab Cameron oma vana klouninumbri, Phil puuab saada kinnisvaratehingu, Manny uus "sõber" on Gloriasse armunud ning Claire tahab, et tema tutred lisaksid ta Facebookis sõbraks.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Valimispaev on kaes ja terve pere tegeleb viimase hetkeni valimiskampaaniaga. Mitch ja Cam teevad Claireile reklaami oma kaubikuga ringi sõites, perekond Dunphy maja on kampaaniakeskus ja Claire annab intervjuusid, aga loomulikult ei lahe kõik plaani jargi.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Claire aitab Lukeil ule saada ta sõbra ja nende vana naabri Walti surmast. Phil veedab Alexiga koos aega, Haley korraldab loata peo. Jay ja Gloria lahevad Mitch ja Cami juurde, et suua õhtust Cami isa Merleiga.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake saab vigastada, kuid uritab siiski kurjategijat tabada. Rosa, Amy ja Gina kutsutakse kapten Holti juurde õhtust sooma, kuid Amy ja Gina jaavad seal ruttu purju.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake ja Amy saavad juurdluse, millega tegeleb suurkuritegude osakonna veteran Majors. Peagi selgub, et nii tema kui Jake võistlevad Amy tahelepanu nimel. Terry kavatseb politseist eraturvafirmasse toole minna.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake ja Boyle hakkavad Wuntchi abiga pangaroovlit taga ajama. Holt kahtlustab Wuntchi tegelikke motiive. Terry korraldab kolleegide abil lastele ekskursiooni, kuid lapsed saavad sellest suure trauma.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jake ja Amy lahevad agentidena identiteedivarast otsima. Juhtum toob nad jallegi teineteisele lahedale. Kapten Holt on sunnitud jaoskonnaga emotsionaalselt huvasti jatma.

programme.title: Brooklyni jaoskond
programme.desc: Jaoskonna uueks juhiks tuleb ainult tõhususe peale mõtlev Seth Dozerman (Bill Hader). Jake ja Amy puuavad otsustada, kuidas tunnete tunnistamine nende tulevikku mõjutab. Holt ja Gina lahevad toole PR-osakonda ja politseiulem Wuntch laseb neil tuhja-tahjaga tegelega.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Alist saab naabrinaisele seksisumbol, mida Peg ei suuda kuidagi uskuda.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al peksab labi Kelly uue kuti ja tutar kolib seepeale kodust ara.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Ali onu lubab talle parandada pool miljonit dollarit, kui perre veel uks laps sunnib ja talle onu jargi nimi antakse. Al ja Peg asuvad tegutsema.
